body: and so. mc became the biggest pussi of al~
Ok with ntr but shit, man— yuichi must be like totally dying inside. Poor guy.
Pretty good series, I really hope the artists comes back again one day, the art is sooo delicious, we need more XD

It was pretty good,but the ending was boring, majority of the NTR doujinshi always makes the "male protagonist" break down because of the adultery or miraculously accept the girl even if she  keeps having sexual relations with other guys and is pregnant with another man's child.... The artists of this genre have pretty good art, just need to inovate on the ending or story overall.

Omg that netorare ending,

So good!
